createwiki-defaultmainpage: __NOTOC__ == Welcome to {{SITENAME}}! == This Main Page was automatically created by a wiki creator (a volunteer who created this wiki per a request), and it seems it hasn't been replaced yet. === For the bureaucrat(s) of this wiki === Hello, and welcome at your new wiki! Thank you for choosing Miraheze for the hosting of your wiki, and we hope you will enjoy our hosting. You can immediately start working on your wiki, whenever you want. Need help? No problem! We will help you with your wiki as needed. To make a start we have added a few links about working with MediaWiki: * [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Help:Contents MediaWiki guide (e.g. navigation, editing, deleting pages, blocking users)] * [https://meta.miraheze.org/wiki/FAQ Miraheze FAQ] *[https://meta.miraheze.org/wiki/Request_features Request extensions, logo/favicon changes and other features for your wiki] ==== But Miraheze, I still don't understand X! ==== Well, that's no problem. Even if something isn't explained in the documentation/FAQ, we still are happy to help you. You can find us here: * [https://meta.miraheze.org/wiki/Help_center On our own Miraheze wiki] * On IRC in #miraheze on irc.freenode.net ([irc://irc.freenode.net/#miraheze direct link]; [http://webchat.freenode.net?channels=%23miraheze webchat]) === For a visitor of this wiki === Hello, the default Main Page of this wiki (this is the default Main Page) has not been replaced yet by the bureaucrat(s) of this wiki. The bureaucrat(s) might still be working on a Main Page, so please check this page again later!
createwiki-desc: An extension to easily create new wikis on a wiki farm.
createwiki-email-body:
Hello, you've recently requested a wiki at Miraheze and we are happy to tell you that it has now been created by one of our volunteers.

Thank you for choosing Miraheze, we wish you good luck with you new wiki!
createwiki-error-dbexists: A wiki with that database name already exists.
createwiki-error-requesternonexistent: The requester doesn't exist on Miraheze Meta.
createwiki-error-notalnum: The database name may not contain non-alphanumeric characters.
createwiki-error-notlowercase: The database name may not contain uppercase letters.
createwiki-error-notsuffixed: The database name doesn't end in a valid suffix (e.g. 'wiki').
createwiki-error-usernotcreated: The requester user was not created on the wiki.
createwiki-notify: '''Hello''', I would like to tell you that I have created your wiki. You can now access it at https://$1.miraheze.org. You should automatically have been granted administrator and bureaucrat rights, if that's not the case then please leave a notice on [[Stewards' noticeboard]] so we can fix it immediately. Do not hesitate to [[Stewards' noticeboard|ask questions]] if your question was not answered in our [[FAQ]]. Also, if you want a extension, gadget, or anything else, please ask us [[Request features|here]]. Thank you for choosing Miraheze, and we wish you good luck with your wiki! ~~~~
log-description-farmer: This log tracks wiki requests, wiki creations and everything related to it.
requestwiki-error-csrf: Sorry, the request could not be submitted due to a loss of session data. Please submit the form again. If that doesn't work, please [[Special:Userlogout|log out]] and log back in.
requestwiki-error-invalidcomment: Your wiki request contains an invalid character. Please try requesting again, and if the problem persists [[Help center|please contact us]]
requestwiki-error-nodomain: You must specify either a subdomain or custom domain.
requestwiki-error-notallfilledin: You have to fill in at least the wiki name and language fields.
requestwiki-error-notime: There has been a problem proccessing your request. Please submit your request again
requestwiki-error-patient: You have already requested a wiki. Please be patient and one of our wiki creators should create it soon. If you need to request another wiki, please wait and you will be able to request later.
requestwiki-error-twodomains: You specified both a subdomain and custom domain: you can only choose between one of them.
requestwiki-header: You are going to request a new wiki at Miraheze, great! We need you to fill in this form, before we can review your request. Your wiki request will be reviewed by a volunteer, and it can be tracked at the page that will be given when submitting your request. If you want a custom domain for your wiki (i.e. not a standard .miraheze.org subdomain), please read [$1 this] first. When you request a wiki, you automatically agree to our [[Dormancy Policy]].
requestwiki-label-comments: Comments (e.g. what is your wiki about?):
requestwiki-notloggedin: Sorry, you need to [$1 log in] before you can request a wiki.
requestwiki-success: Your wiki request ($1) was successfully submitted. Your request will be reviewed by a volunteer as soon as possible.
requestwikiqueue-request-header-changest: Change the status of this wiki request
requestwikiqueue-request-header-requeste: Comment given by the wiki requester
requestwikiqueue-request-status: Change the status of this wiki request
